Text: Seizert Capital Partners LLC increased its holdings in shares of BlackRock Enhanced Global Dividend Trust by 17.2% in the 2nd quarter. Seizert Capital Partners LLC now owns 138,020 shares of the financial services provider's stock worth $1,481,000 after buying an additional 20,223 shares during the last quarter.
